title: Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail"", 1935
medium: Pen and  black ink, brush and black ink, white gouache, graphite on heavy white wove paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: An abstract rendering of bird, the body in solid black with white circular eye, resting on the tip of a small, elongated triangle deliniated in heavy black line in upper right corner.  A white diagonal line connects the two triangular wings across the central black body.  The beak is indicated by a small white triangle which touches the left margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail"", 1935.
1935. Pen and  black ink, brush and black ink, white gouache, graphite on heavy white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-900.
